questions.question: Which of the following has the lowest electrical conductivity?

explanations.a: Salinity generally increases conductivity due to dissolved ions.
explanations.b: Silt has moderate conductivity due to fine particles.
explanations.c: Sand has the lowest conductivity due to large particles and poor ion retention.
explanations.d: Clay usually has high conductivity due to high cation exchange capacity.

questions.question: The equivalence of 1 atmosphere osmotic pressure in millimhos/cm electrical conductivity isâ€¦

explanations.c: Correct value for 1 atmosphere osmotic pressure equivalence.
explanations.d: Close, but not the standard value.
